name: House Jumper
description:
You're a kid that just got home from school before your parents. With nothing to do or watch, you  decide to play the floor is lava. Will you manage to survive this jump for survival and enter your room?

Made for https://itch.io/jam/trijam-171

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump and press space again to perform a double jump

Q to do a short dash forward

R to restart

Credits

https://itch.io/profile/villman (3d artist and cover image)
